name: A Light Through Time
description:
DISCLAIMER: Please refrain from using fullscreen in the WebGL app if your monitor does not have a 16:9 resolution!

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2, A Light Through Time is retro top-down shooter where you can rewind time (to an extent, at least).

Test your skill positioning yourself to reflect a photon, while avoiding the waves of enemies coming your way.

This modern homage to the arcade is easy to learn, yet hard to master, with the difficulty scaling up rapidly. Those looking for an even bigger challenge might find the "one life" mode tickles their fancy!
